rainbowTrout.name: Rainbow Trout
rainbowTrout.description: Fresh farmed rainbow trout, carefully processed and delivered
rainbowTrout.details: Our rainbow trout is farmed in the clean waters of the Finnish archipelago

whitefish.name: Whitefish
whitefish.description: Premium quality whitefish from sustainable sources
whitefish.details: Locally sourced whitefish, processed with care

char.name: Arctic Char
char.details: Farm-raised arctic char known for its rich taste

caviar.name: Caviar
caviar.details: Carefully processed red caviar available in late autumn and early winter

about.title: About M.A.T-Fish
about.subtitle: Quality Fish Products Since 1970
about.historyText: M.A.T-Fish Ab Oy has been operating in the Föglö region since the 1970s, providing premium quality fish products to our customers.
about.missionText: Our mission is to provide the highest quality fish products while maintaining sustainable farming practices.
about.visionText: To be the leading provider of premium fish products in Finland, known for quality and sustainability.

home.title: M.A.T-Fish - Premium Fish Products & Processing
home.description: Leading provider of premium quality fish products in Finland. Fresh rainbow trout, whitefish, char, and caviar from sustainable sources.

products.title: Our Products - Premium Fish & Caviar | M.A.T-Fish
products.description: Discover our range of premium fish products including rainbow trout, whitefish, char, and seasonal caviar. Fresh and sustainably farmed.

about.title: About Us - M.A.T-Fish Ab Oy
about.description: Learn about M.A.T-Fish's history, values, and commitment to sustainable fish farming and processing in Finland's archipelago.

contact.title: Contact M.A.T-Fish - Get in Touch
contact.description: Contact M.A.T-Fish for premium fish products and processing services. Located in Föglö, Finland.
